Text: Hey is there a crack file ???

not a Crack file but decrypted BGL files that unlock the Scenery.
this is from the readme file:

1) Start AeroKiller first, if you don't want to have all your previously
   installed unregistered scenery files encrypted back to BLOBs!

2) Start the installation procedure and do everything until the registration
   page.

2) Then enter the serial below to register the product:

   PCCGroup@mail.ru
   6bH0s5rUnse29qnxtMSw5fforPb5pPmk

3) Finish the installation.

4) Exchange all BLOB files from Scenery folder with decrypted BGLs from
   installation package.

5) Enjoy the scenery!

Thanks a lot for the scenery.
From where do you get aerokiller file?
It is much better ........ I'm happy :-)
